Package com.github.koraktor.mavanagaiata.mojo

Class CheckMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.github.koraktor.mavanagaiata.mojo.AbstractGitMojo
        • com.github.koraktor.mavanagaiata.mojo.CheckMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    @Mojo(name="check",
      defaultPhase=VALIDATE,
      threadSafe=true)
public class CheckMojo
extends AbstractGitMojo
    This goal checks various aspects of a Git repository to ensure it is in a valid state prior to a build

    The following checks are available:

    • Clean working directory (enabled by default)
    • Tagged commit
    • Branch name
    • Commit message
    Since:
    0.8.0
    Author:
    Sebastian Staudt
